Reason: The 'bucket.size' configuration is classified as performance-sensitive. This is because the 'bucket.size' directly impacts the rendering process by determining the size of the buckets used for rendering. The value of 'bucket.size' is clamped between 16 and 512, and it affects various calculations and adjustments related to anti-aliasing settings, filter adjustments, and subpixel sizes. Changes in the 'bucket.size' configuration can lead to notable performance variations at the system level, as it influences the number of buckets processed during rendering, thus directly affecting the rendering performance.
